info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 12 at 9:04AM EDT until May 12 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of eastern North Carolina, including the following county, Onslow.
* WHEN...Until 1100 AM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 904 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to numerous showers and thunderstorms. Minor flooding is expected across the advisory area, especially low lying and poor drainage areas. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jacksonville, North Topsail Beach, Camp Lejeune Center, New River Station, Piney Green, Swansboro, Hubert, Verona, Dixon, Midway Park, Folkstone, Sneads Ferry, Sea View Pier, Holly Ridge and Haws Run. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING
